com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel.sunrise

Class SunriseControllerSafety

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel.sunrise.SunriseSafetyStateProvider<ControllerSafetyState>
      • com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel.sunrise.SunriseControllerSafety
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IControllerSafety, ISafetyStateProvider<ControllerSafetyState>

    public class SunriseControllerSafety
extends SunriseSafetyStateProvider<ControllerSafetyState>
implements IControllerSafety
    This class provides a controller specific safety state.

      • setEsmState

        public void setEsmState(String name)
        Description copied from interface: IControllerSafety
        Sets an ESM (Event-driven Safety Monitoring) state configured in the safety configuration.

        If the given parameter is a valid ESM name but the corresponding ESM state is not known in the safety configuration a stop category 1 is performed.

        Specified by:
        setEsmState in interface IControllerSafety
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the ESM state. Must be a numeric string between '1' and '10'.

      • getAvailableOperationModes

        public Set<com.kuka.roboticsAPI.deviceModel.OperationMode> getAvailableOperationModes()
        Specified by:
        getAvailableOperationModes in interface IControllerSafety
        Returns:
        which operation modes are currently available on the controller.

      • isSmartPadConnected

        public boolean isSmartPadConnected()
        Specified by:
        isSmartPadConnected in interface IControllerSafety
        Returns:
        whether a physical smartPAD device is currently connected to the controller. Will only return false if the smartPAD was properly unplugged (using the respective button).

        Description copied from interface: IControllerSafety
        Resumes safety.
